about_the_game:
BattleCap is a casual naval combat shooting game suitable for 1 to 4 players. Come on, become a top BattleCap sailor, pick up the caps floating on the sea, and assemble your own battleship! Engage in thrilling battles with friends or join forces to defeat those furious sea monsters, enjoying the endless fun of the clash of various warships and tactics!

Collect Caps and Naval Combat Shooting

Bid farewell to the rigid control of traditional naval warfare; the Nymph's battleship offers a refreshing experience. The operation is simple, allowing you to master it in just a few minutes!

Gather the scattered caps, glue them into a powerful turret, and craft a giant battleship capable of extending and transforming!

Three Major Battle Zones, Diverse Maps

From mysterious ruins to devilish whirlpools, experience a variety of environmental features and tactical shifts. Utilize the scene's mechanisms to gain an advantage!

Roguelite Elements Throughout the Party

Want to be stronger? Acquire powerful caps from airdrops or purchase blessings and relics from the store to bestow more special abilities upon your battleship!

Cap Party (Party PVP Mode, Multiplayer only)

  • In the Party PVP mode, experience the intense and exhilarating three-round tournament, challenging multiple meticulously designed map stages.

  • The selection of your battleship and the random map will jointly determine your subsequent tactical strategy—will you charge recklessly or develop cautiously?

  • Also, look forward to the mid-game mini-games that could spike your blood pressure!

Sea Monster Fishing (Cooperative PVP Mode, Single Player or Multiplayer)

  • Even more Roguelite elements: Collect rare blessings and relics to fortify your BattleCap flagship and embark on an unprecedented naval battle!

  • Defend the Nymph's camp against waves of enemy assaults!

  • In addition to solo challenges, you can also invite friends to collaborate, sharing the pressure from the sea monsters and offering mutual support.

Join BattleCap now and assemble your battleship!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 12100f or equal CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or equal GPU
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio

short_description: Dive into an exhilarating maritime battle for 1 to 4 players! Assemble warships with a variety of bottle caps, allowing the warships to transform and break, experiencing flexible physics that brings a refreshing maritime battle! Fight monsters together, or engage in a battle with your friends.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
